## SecurityQuestionsAuth.getEnrolledQuestions() method

Reads a list of security questions enrolled by the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getEnrolledQuestions(user: User): Promise<Questions>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  user | <code>User</code> | a user's name. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Questions>`

a promise to return a list of enrolled questions.
